def gcd(x, y):
    while y > 0:
        x, y = y, x % y
    return x

for _ in range(input()):
    n, q = map(int, raw_input().split())
    a = map(int, raw_input().split())
    lg, rg = [0], [0]
    for v in a:
        lg.append(gcd(v, lg[-1]))
    for v in reversed(a):
        rg.append(gcd(v, rg[-1]))
    rg.reverse()
    for _ in range(q):
        l, r = map(int, raw_input().split())
        print gcd(lg[l - 1], rg[r])
